verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> The <S%H410>mighty<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> even the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> from the <S%H4480>rising<s%> <S%H4217><s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the going <S%H3996>down<s%> thereof.
Out of <S%H4480>Zion,<s%> <S%H6726><s%> the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3313>shined.<s%>

Our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H408>not<s%> keep <S%H2790>silence:<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and it shall be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8175>tempestuous<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

He shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> from <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H5920><s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that he may <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Gather my saints <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H2623><s%> unto me; those that have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H1931>himself.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> against thee: <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H430>God,<s%> even thy <S%H430>God.<s%>
I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> or thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> to have been <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> nor he <S%H6260>goats<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>folds.<s%> <S%H4356><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> is mine, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> upon a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2042>hills.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> and the wild <S%H2123>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H5978>mine.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I were <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> I would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> is mine, and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof.
Will I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls,<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>goats?<s%>
Offer <S%H2076><s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the most High: <S%H5945><s%>
And call <S%H7121>upon<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble:<s%> I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3513>glorify<s%> me.

But unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou to do to <S%H5608>declare<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> or that thou shouldest <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth?<s%>
Seeing <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H8130>hatest<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H7993>castest<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> thee.

When <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> then thou <S%H7521>consentedst<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and hast been <S%H2506>partaker<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H5003>adulterers.<s%>
Thou <S%H7971>givest<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and thy <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frameth<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
Thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> and <S%H1696>speakest<s%> against thy <S%H251>brother;<s%> thou <S%H5414>slanderest<s%> <S%H1848><s%> thine own <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> things hast thou <S%H6213>done,<s%> and I kept <S%H2790>silence;<s%> thou <S%H1819>thoughtest<s%> that I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1961>altogether<s%> such a one as <S%H3644>thyself:<s%> but I will <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee, and set them in <S%H6186>order<s%> before thine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Now <S%H4994><s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> ye that <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I tear you in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> and there be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>

Whoso <S%H2076>offereth<s%> <S%H8426>praise<s%> <S%H3513>glorifieth<s%> me: and to him that <S%H7760>ordereth<s%> his <S%H1870>conversation<s%> aright will I <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
